rule: The output must disregard the subjects of the photo and their characteristics first.
input: An open field with wildflowers under morning mist and a wooden barn in the distance. The photo should evoke tranquility.
validityText:
The input describes an open field with wildflowers under morning mist and a wooden barn in the distance, focusing on the subjects and characteristics. It includes information on timing (morning mist), describes the background and setting (open field, wooden barn in the distance), and conveys the feeling the image should evoke (tranquility). The input is written in a single paragraph, in English, and combines artistic insight with precise imagery. The input is also under 80 words.

OK
coverageText: A vast open field dotted with vibrant wildflowers sits under a gentle morning mist, creating a serene atmosphere. In the distance, a quaint wooden barn adds a rustic touch to the scene. The soft, diffused morning light enhances the calm and peaceful feeling of the image. The background is framed by the distant horizon, with the mist lending a dreamlike quality. The photo should evoke a deep sense of tranquility and natural beauty.
coverageEvalText:
The output provides a detailed description in a single paragraph, and focuses on subjects, characteristics, timing, lighting, and background. It also conveys the feeling the image should evoke. Additionally, it is crafted within the specified 80-word limit. 

OK
